New Records: Shakib Al Hasan reached 6,000 T20 runs, making him only the second cricketer to score this many runs and take more than 400 wickets in the format.
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 2 wickets with 4 balls remaining.
Kusal Mendis scored 60 off 37 balls despite surviving four chances.
Ebadot Hossain took 3 wickets for 51 runs.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz scored 38 runs in his first T20I in four years.
Asitha Fernando struck two fours in the last four balls of the match to seal the win for Sri Lanka.
Mahedi Hasan's no-ball in the last over proved costly for Bangladesh.
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh experimented with their opening pair, sending out Sabbir Rahman and Mehidy Hasan Miraz.
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka celebrated their victory with huge celebrations and rounds of laughter.
Bangladesh rued their mistakes on the field, including dropped catches and missed run-outs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the Men's T20 Asia Cup.
The game was held in Dubai.
Sri Lanka advanced to the Super 4 stage of the Asia Cup.
Bangladesh was eliminated from the Asia Cup.
